request.description: Get all devil fruits with pagination and filtering

response.name: Successful Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "count": 2,
    "pagination": {
        "currentPage": 1,
        "totalPages": 1,
        "totalItems": 2,
        "itemsPerPage": 10
    },
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Gomu Gomu no Mi",
            "japanese_name": "ゴムゴムの実",
            "type_id": 1,
            "description": "Rubber fruit",
            "abilities": "Stretching abilities",
            "weaknesses": "Cutting attacks",
            "awakening_description": "Sun God Nika form",
            "current_user_id": 1,
            "previous_users": [2, 3],
            "image_url": "https://example.com/gomu-gomu.jpg",
            "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
            "type": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Paramecia",
                "description": "Grants superhuman abilities, most common type"
            }
        }
    ]
}

    "name": "Mera Mera no Mi",
    "japanese_name": "メラメラの実",

    "description": "Flame-Flame Fruit",

response.name: Successful Response
